alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:13AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, central St. Helena, Pointe Coupee, northwestern Livingston, East Feliciana, northwestern Iberville and East Baton Rouge Parishes, Wilkinson and Amite Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 1012 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Woodville to near Fort Adams to Goudeau. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Port Allen, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Liberty, Oak Hills Place, Walker, Addis, Brusly, Livingston, Centreville, Livonia, Maringouin, Woodville and Slaughter. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 129 and 163. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 21. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
